starvationevasion.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds all the logic for managing connections, game progression, and Simulator.

        public double getTimeDiff(long curr)
        Get the time of server spawn time to a given time.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        difference time in seconds

      • getUserByUsername

        public User getUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Get a User by the username
        Returns:
        User if found, null if not found

      • getUserList

        public java.util.List<User> getUserList()
        Get list of all users. This is a accureate representation of users that are in the DB.
        Returns:
        List of Users.

      • createUser

        public boolean createUser(User u)
        Create a user. This will check if username is empty, null, and make sure its unique. If all is ok, its sent to db.
        Returns:
        true if user successfully saved into DB, false if failed.

      • getLoggedInCount

        public int getLoggedInCount()

      • getLoggedInUsers

        public java.util.List<User> getLoggedInUsers()

      • getUserCount

        public int getUserCount()

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(Response response)
        Send a Response to everyone that is connected via a persistant connection.

      • killServer

        public void killServer()
        Kill the server. This also sends a boardcast to everyone that the server is shutting down.

      • getGameState

        public State getGameState()
        Get the current state of the Game.
        Returns:
        current state of the Game

      • restartGame

        public void restartGame()
        Restart the Game. Sets all the sets all User.isPlaying to false. resets all the User's hands, also sets the current state to LOGIN.

      • stopGame

        public void stopGame()
        Stops the game by setting current state to END also sets isPlaying to false.

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.List<User> getPlayers()
        Get list of all the Players. Players are defined as Users that are currently aligned to play in the upcomming game. User that is a player: isPlayer == true && Region is set.
        Returns:
        List of users

      • getPlayerCount

        public int getPlayerCount()
        Number of current players
        Returns:
        number of players

      • addPlayer

        public boolean addPlayer(User u)
        Add a user to list of players. If the User's Region is not set it will be set. If the region that is chosen is already taken then the User will not be added.
        Returns:
        true if the User is added as a player

      • getAvailableRegions

        public java.util.List<EnumRegion> getAvailableRegions()
        List of available regions
        Returns:
        List of available regions

      • draftCard

        public void draftCard(GameCard card,
                      User u)
        Draft a card into voting ballot.
        Parameters:
        card - Card to add into ballot
        u - User that is drafting

      • addVote

        public boolean addVote(GameCard card,
                       EnumRegion user)
        Add a vote to a card
        Parameters:
        card - Card to add vote
        user - User that voted YES on a card
        Returns:
        true if vote was accounted for

      • drawByUser

        public void drawByUser(User user)
        Draw cards by User
        Parameters:
        user - User that needs hand to be filled

      • startAI

        public boolean startAI()
        Start AI as seperate process.
        Returns:
        true if starting AI was successful false otherwise

      • killAI

        public void killAI()
        Kill AI process. AI are set up as FIFO(LinkedList), this will poll() and kill.

      • discard

        public void discard(User u,
                    EnumPolicy card)
        Discard a Policy based on user

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
